title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.1 - Application of rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.1 - Application of rule

State Regulations

This Part applies to all retail licensees authorized to
sell alcoholic beverages at retail and to all manufacturers and wholesalers who
sell and deliver alcoholic beverages to any such retailers. Hotel off-premises
permittees are subject to the provisions of section 101-aa. Wherever the term
manufacturer or wholesaler is used herein, it shall be deemed to refer to a
manufacturer or wholesaler who makes any sale or delivery of alcoholic
beverages to retail licensees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
68.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
